email.title: Merch Now Available!
email.heading: Hoodies, T-Shirts, and Beanies Are Now Available!
email.text:
Head on over to the Union's website to buy DoCSoc-branded hoodies, T-shirts, and beanies.
They will be available until Sunday 14th at 23.00, of course at rock bottom prices thanks to our [lovely sponsors](https://docsoc.co.uk/sponsors/).

Get yours now at the Union's website
